node.title: 'He promised he'd come back really fast': Hayez family's agony brings coroner to tears
node.alt: People hugging and standing around out the front of a building
node.description: Heart-rending statements inside and outside Byron Bay court today as coronial inquest into the Belgian backpacker's disappearance adjournsÂ until next year.
node.content:
["Emotional statements from the family of missing Belgian backpacker Th\u00e9o Hayez brought State Coroner Teresa O'Sullivan to tears as the first stage of an inquest into the teenager's disappearance ended in Byron Bay today. \u00a0", "Ms O'Sullivan called an\u00a0adjournment after submissions from the Hayez family on the impact of Th\u00e9o's\u00a0 disappearance were read to the court.", "\"Everyone in this courtroom these last two weeks has felt your pain,\" she said.\u00a0", "Theo's younger brother, Lucas Hayez, told the court about one of the last moments he had with his brother.", "\"Before leaving I had asked him for a jumper with his smell in memory of him waiting for his return,\" he wrote in French, which was translated for the court.", "", "
Lucas Hayez (centre), mother Vinciane Delforge (left) and grandmother Jacqueline Jourquin today.(ABC North Coast: Emma Rennie)
", "Th\u00e9o's mother Vinciane Delforge spoke about her son's personality, his desire to come home and the family's grief at having no answers.", "\"Not knowing is unbearable,\" she said.", "\"Our life, if we still have one, is a daily struggle and life doesn't have the same taste anymore.", "\"Part of me left with Th\u00e9o, staying alive is a struggle.", "Theo's father Laurent Hayez spoke about his frustration that companies could track people's movements and sell their data to advertising companies but seemed unwilling to cooperate with families trying to find missing loved ones.", "Th\u00e9o's grandmother, Jacqueline Jourquin, spoke about the close relationship she had with her first grandchild.", "
Hayez family welcomes chance of reward
", "Earlier in the day, the court heard the officer in charge of the investigation, Detective Senior Constable Philip Parker, would today submit an application to the relevant police command to have a reward offered in respect to Th\u00e9o's disappearance.", "However, the application was subject to internal and external approval process and could not be guaranteed.", "", "
Theo Hayez's father Laurent Hayez during the family statement outside the Byron Bay courthouse.(ABC North Coast: Emma Rennie)
", "Outside the Byron Bay courthouse, Th\u00e9o's godfather, Jean-Philippe Pector, made a statement on behalf of the family:", "
'So much compassion'\u00a0for Hayez family\u00a0
", "Today, the inquest also heard from Byron Bay resident Dr Sheri Todd, one of the many volunteers who searched for Th\u00e9o .", "She described the effort the community has gone to in their efforts to find Th\u00e9o.", "As well as large-scale land searches and digital mapping of dense bushland, locals distribution of missing person\u00a0posters nationally, ran social media pages, organised\u00a0events and supported\u00a0Theo's family when they arrived from Belgium.", "Asked by counsel assisting the coroner Kirsten Edwards about the \"incredible community response\", Dr Todd said people the Byron Bay community was generally compassionate and empathetic.", "At the end of today's hearing, Ms O'Sullivan said there would be a further three days of hearings evidence from three witnesses in February.", "Outside court, the family thanked everyone involved in the search for Th\u00e9o."]
